name: PUBLIC HEARINGS AND CITY DEVELOPMENT
text: Aarhus Kommune is at the moment developing several areas of the city - e.g. Aarhus Ø, Aarhus K, Sydhavnen, not to mention Amtssygehuset. On June 21, approaching a public hearing for the development plan of Amtssygehuset, a host of young inhabitans connected to Amtssygehuset met to discuss the development of the area.
description: Aarhus Kommune is at the moment developing several areas of the city - e.g. Aarhus Ø, Aarhus K, Sydhavnen, not to mention Amtssygehuset.

name: Flukhx Meeting
description: CONVERSATION ABOUT GROWTH LAYER CULTURE IN AARHUS
